title: 269: Mark Bell Interview
description: Sal, Adam & Justin interview Mark Bell who is an acclaimed pro powerlifter, inventor and magazine publisher. He was featured in the 2008 Sundance documentary “Bigger Stronger Faster” and the 2015 Tribeca documentary “Prescription Thugs.” Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Learn more about Mind Pump at www.mindpumpmedia.com
